name: Code Name: MISSION UNKNOWN
description:
*Maybe at the first time you play the game it will take some time..

Please fill this feedback form: Here!

FULL SCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPRIENCE

In year 2254, the humankind went outside of the solar system for one nearly impossible mission: to ocuppy the Orion star.  One brave astronaut was sent to this impossible mission, but there was a one LITTLE problem...  IT WAS INDEED IMPOSSIBLE

Instructions:
The mouse is your controller and you need to "Dash" through an enemy to... hmmm... help'em fall asleep :)
Pay attention to the Oxygen and Health Bar because each movement,
will decrease your Oxygen Bar unless you'll be inside the H2O area.
[Oxygen drops down during idle standing as well - but slower].
If you have 100% oxygen the Health Bar will slowly increase.
Your mission is to survive as many waves until you reach the Boss Level!
Good Luck!
